text:
onedot.cc | Data Preparation Expert / Data analyst | Zurich | SALARY: 90k-120k CHF | ONSITE | EU-Passport holders only

We solve one of the biggest problems in e-commerce: Normalizing product information. Using machine learning and NLP we transform broken, badly-labeled, unstructured data into useable, categorised and normalized data.

Let's say you are the owner of an e-commerce shop for tools. There are three suppliers sending you the "same" model of screw; one calls it SCREW-ABC-123 in his CSV, the second one calls it SCREW.ABC.123 in his XLSX, third one SCREW/ABC/1-2-3 and drops it in a Word-file.

How to bring this quickly into your SQL database? Well, so far companies employ people do this manual work, and we are using Math and NLP to automate this.

We work mainly with Scala (backend) and we research a lot on NLP and ML to further the field.

We look for:

- Data Preparation Expert / Data analyst - you will help our customers adjust their data to our platform.

The interview process:

1) Screening of your CV and a few questions why you want to join us

2) Technical call with CTO or engineer

3) Onsite day solving a programming task with us.

Send us a short intro about yourself to:

hiring@onedot.cc
